articles.title: Stadia’s next exclusive is PixelJunk Raiders, releasing March 1st - The Verge
articles.description: PixelJunk Raiders is the next exclusive coming to Google’s Stadia game streaming service. The game will release on the service on March 1st. It’ll sell for $19.99 (€19.99) on Stadia and will be included free with Stadia Pro.
articles.content: The release comes after Google shut down its first-party studios earlier this month
